title: (x) Urgently need Gotham Rounded
content:
I urgently need to buy GOTHAM ROUNDED does anybody know where i cna do this, as it is a hoefler and fere jones font ... but not on there site.. ad needs to go to print in an hour..

:(

\*help\*
author: beek

comments.content: Pretty sure it's a custom typeface created just for PRINT magazine. And why you're leaving this till the hour before it goes to print is puzzling.
Isn't that custom for Print magazine?

haha, i wasnt leaving it.. we were supplied the font by client, but it is a corrupt pc font, and i am on a mac.

Strange then that they have access to the font?
Hi, Can you guarrantee this is there font.. as Now i am concerned how our client has aqured this font.. ?

Unless your client is Print Magazine, it is probably a pirated copy, of a copy, etc. which also explains the corruption of the file. You should consider switching to another rounded face... [Bryant](http://web.archive.org/web/20111224062324/http:/processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryant2/index.html) would be one option. [Message](http://web.archive.org/web/20111224062324/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=TB.111758.0.0) is another.

wow, you have all been a great help, and it has been much appreciated.

The client is not print magazine, and as it turned out, they do have purchase rights to the font Gotham Rounded.

Consecutively as i was trying to track down an uncorrupted version of the font from the client, i phoned up Hoefler & fere jones, and asked to purchase the font.

Then 20 mins later, they had sent it to me.. all at a cost of course.

So although it was comissioned for print magazine they obviously dont have exclusive rights to the font.

cheers.
